org.ssa4j.mock
Class MockScrapeSessionManager

java.lang.Object
  org.ssa4j.ScrapeSessionManager
      org.ssa4j.mock.MockScrapeSessionManager

public class MockScrapeSessionManager
extends ScrapeSessionManager

Creates a Mock version of a ScrapeSessionManager that enables for better testing and development of solutions that would otherwise be held up pending a *real* scraping session to test against. This is also useful for creating and testing boundary cases that may be impossible to create against a *real* system.

Configuring a MockScrapeSessionManager

Before you can use this class you need to do some setup for your environment.
  1. Create a directory somewhere on your system that will become the location for all the mock data files you are going to create for your objects.
  2. Create mock data files for every Scraping Session that you want to mock

NOTE: For a complete overview of the structure of a mock data file please see the package notes.

Author:
Rodney Aiglstorfer
